author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Learnt words:

Rushia says "Tadaimango"  (Tadaima + 🥭), we answer "Okaeringo" (Okaeri + 🍎)

Also since late 2020, she says the "I understand" phrase as "Naruhororaibu" (Naruhodou + Hololive). Casually, she's maybe the only holomember to say that word.

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Curiously, this was the first time with a Camera Live... (Another one was at Kana-tan stream in Xmas; in that, along with Rushia and Kana-tan, Coco-kaichou and Haachama were there)

But also curiously, Rushia made a Daipan at live... And tested, she can't destroy Desk-kun at Live. (That remembered to her "elder sister" Kamiki Hasami)
20.000 JPY were spent at these "Scratch and Win" (There aren't lottery tickets, because these have 5 numbers and 1 wildcard in case of having 4 hits) and Aproximately 6800 JPY were returned... But at Superchats she gained more... About 1.800.000 JPY. (Source: Playboard)

As surprise, Peko-chan was at LiveChat. Rushia calls her and laughed like her.

And at Supaachaato Orei Time, user named Rinshia sent at consecutive times 1000 JPY per Superchat (Kiirosupa)

Wonderful stream today...

:_ちょうちょ: Uruha Rushia's Original Character Design by Yasuyuki-sensei. 
(For more Information, please contact him at Twitter as "yasu00kamiki" and "kamikirebasami") 
:_ハート: Live2D modeling by Tou Ilie.

author: Vyse
text:
Rushia scratching 100 lottery tickets reminds of those times of Rushia rolling for girls in Uma Musume Pretty Derby.

I look at this stream as Rushia spending 20,000 yen trying her best to be creative to give her Fandeads a fun time to hang out with her. Rushia seemed like she had a lot of fun just scratching and seeing the results she got. The biggest win was Rushia spending time with her Fandeads.:_るんるん::_ハート:
As always, thank you for streaming, Rushia. See you soon and rest well.:_猫耳るしあｚｚｚ:

ちょろっと映っちゃった部分も、むしろるしあちゃんを感じられて嬉しかったな:_るんるん:

author: mouns
text:
宝くじ配信新鮮で楽しかった！るしあが新しいことに挑戦するたびにるしあの新しい魅力が見えてくる気がして嬉しい！
当たりを全力で喜んでいる様子が最高にかわいかったよ！
カメラを使った配信も新鮮でるしあを近くに感じてどきどきした！生台パンも見られて満足！
今日もありがとう！るしあ大好きだよ！

author: LucckyS
text:
I almost had a heart attack multiple times during this stream... 
It's been a while since I last felt this nervous. Her removing her mask because it was too hot, the daipans on that weak tiny table, the accidental hand and nail on camera, Nyanko-sensei coming in hot for attention. Imagine if he jumped on the table. OOF. Too much for my heart.. And something at the last seconds to remind us the rollercoaster this stream was. It was hard to watch, but also really fun! Kage tskr 🙏 Also, Rushia's long talk about One Piece and a little about HxH was so good, Can she get any more perfect?!
It was my first time watching a superchat reading from her and the Fandeads really made it awesome.~

This was quite the experience. The kind of stream that it's worth from the beginning till the end.

author: むはにたあ
text:
たとえ200円でも全力で喜ぶからハズレだろうが何だろうが面白かった。
